name: Titanic
description: A love story unfolds between a rich young woman and a poor artist aboard the ill-fated ship, the Titanic.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

name: The Godfather
description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

name: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold through the viewpoint of an Alabama man.

name: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception: planting an idea into a target's subconscious.

name: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to save Middle-earth.

name: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
